intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you do when it rains?
What is your favorite thing to do in nature?
What do you like to eat?

respond_situations.description: You are in a clothing shop. You see a shirt.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you need help finding something?
Happy birthday! Are you having a party?
respond_situations.description: You meet your friend on their birthday.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You can choose a drink.

ask_situations.instruction: You are in class. You want to ask your teacher a question. ..
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are at a store. Ask the cashier for the price of a toy.

listening_script.text: I go to the beach. The sun is bright. I swim in the sea. I build sandcastles. I like to relax on the sand.

questions.question: What do you do at the beach?
When do you go to the beach?

follow_up_questions.question: What did you eat for dinner?
When do you usually eat dinner?
